import HeroImage from './images/hero-image.png' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; function App() { const [top, setTop] = useState(true); const handlePostMethod = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); document.getElementById('forma').submit(); } useEffect(() => { const scrollHandler = () => { window.pageYOffset > 10 ? setTop(false) : setTop(true) }; window.addEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', scrollHandler); }, [top]); return ( <>
